data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Mwaro, Burundi to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mwaro, Burundi
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Mwaro, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 82,931 believers in Mwaro to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Mwaro.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Swahili people might believe through him.
Spirit, encourage the church of Mwaro, Burundi that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Mwaro, Burundi the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mwaro, Burundi has a population of 274,900.

We estimate Mwaro has 82,931 people who might know Jesus, 173,803 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,166 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Mwaro to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
